greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of subsets of the n-th roots of 1 with absolute value of sum = 1.
comment: a(n) is divisible by n (rotation symmetry). a(n)/n differs from A107754 by a factor of 2 for odd n.
results.author: _Wouter Meeussen_, Jun 02 2005
